channel.title: Prices
channel.description:
Ok, i'm lazy so this is my problem
In Item.cfg this is what i have for D long
[code]item = 1305 Dragon_longsword A_very_powerful_sword. 100000 100000 100000... and on[/code]
Well see the second "100,000" is the sell back price. Is there a way where I can make it where whatever it says for sell back price is Divided by 3. So it would say 100,000 100,000 100,000 but it would mean [code]100,000 33,333.333 100,000[/code]
The reason i think this is possible like it says 100,000 for D long alching price and it only alchs part of that.

item.title: Prices
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:3, topic:111916”][quote author=Rich Dude99 link=topic=159923.msg1500726#msg1500726 date=1182036656]
Sorry to say it, but no its not possible…
[/quote]

It is possible.[/quote]
Would you happen to know how?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 12:34:16 PM[/size][hr]So no one knows this… I figured it might be somewhere in ItemHandler.java or ShopHandler.java but i’ve already looked, and sadly to say, i don’t understand most of it.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 12:45:56 PM[/size][hr]Your kidding me… Somebody HAS to know how to do it…

Read full topic

item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

Ok, i’m lazy so this is my problem

In Item.cfg this is what i have for D long

item = 1305	Dragon_longsword	A_very_powerful_sword.	100000	100000	100000... and on

Well see the second “100,000” is the sell back price. Is there a way where I can make it where whatever it says for sell back price is Divided by 3. So it would say 100,000 100,000 100,000 but it would mean

100,000     33,333.333     100,000

The reason i think this is possible like it says 100,000 for D long alching price and it only alchs part of that.
